trans-unit.source: This is an overview of the pages in the database containing one or more template records. Click a page title to go to the page.
trans-unit.target: This is an overview of the pages in the database containing one or more template records. Click a page title to go to the page.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to do this?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to do this?

trans-unit.source: There was no template on this page!
trans-unit.target: There was no template on this page!

trans-unit.source: Create a template record first in order to edit constants!
trans-unit.target: Create a template record first in order to edit constants!

trans-unit.source: You need to create a template record below in order to edit your configuration.
trans-unit.target: You need to create a template record below in order to edit your configuration.

trans-unit.source: If you want this page to be the root of a new website, optionally based on one of the standard templates, then press the button below:
trans-unit.target: If you want this page to be the root of a new website, optionally based on one of the standard templates, then press the button below:

trans-unit.source: Create template for a new site
trans-unit.target: Create template for a new site

trans-unit.source: An extension template allows you to enter TypoScript values that will affect only this page and subpages.
trans-unit.target: An extension template allows you to enter TypoScript values that will affect only this page and subpages.

trans-unit.source: Click here to create an extension template.
trans-unit.target: Click here to create an extension template.

trans-unit.source: Go to closest page with template
trans-unit.target: Go to closest page with template
